title: Watch ICE
communityFeedClear: The community feed is clear. Be the first to report a sighting.
tapToSelect: Tap to select or take a picture/video
unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload an image or video.
photoOrVideoRequired: A photo or video is required to make a report.
reportCreationError: Could not create report. Please check permissions and network connection.
locationError: Could not get your location. Please enable location services and try again.
usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
emailExists: An account with this email already exists.
createAccountPrompt: Create an account or log in to report sightings and set up personalized alerts for your area.
getNotifiedPrompt_part1: To get notified with customized realtime when ICE is spotted near you,
getNotifiedPrompt_part2: to configure your custom notification settings.
addressPlaceholder: Enter an address, city, or ZIP code
locationNotFound: Could not find location. Please try a different address.
noMatchingReportsHint: Try a different filter or search query.
notificationLocationDesc: Set a primary address to receive notifications for reports in that area.
addressPlaceholderSettings: Start typing your home or work address
notificationRadiusDesc: Receive alerts for reports within this distance of your set location.
notificationMethodsDesc: How should we send you alerts? (Email and SMS are for demonstration purposes).
locationNotFoundSettings: Could not find location for the provided address. Please check it and try again.
locationFoundVerify: Location found. Please verify the address below, as it may be inaccurate on some devices.
locationAddressError: Location found, but could not determine the address. Please enter it manually.
locationGpsError: Could not get your location via GPS. Please enter your address manually.
locationPermissionDenied: Permission to access location was denied. Please check your browser settings or enter the address manually.
locationPositionUnavailable: Location information is unavailable. Please enter your address manually.
locationTimeout: Request to get user location timed out. Please enter your address manually.
helpMissionDesc: Watch ICE is a community-powered alert system designed to promote safety and awareness. By sharing and receiving real-time, verified reports of ICE activity, community members can stay informed and help one another.
helpForVisitorsDesc: Anyone can view the most recent reports on our home page. You can filter reports by state and county to see activity in a specific region.
helpRegisteringDesc: To report a sighting or receive custom notifications, you must create an account. Registration is simple and only requires a username, email, and password. Once logged in, you can:
helpRegisteringPoint1: Click the "Report Sighting" button to submit a new report.
helpRegisteringPoint2: Your location will be captured, and you'll be asked to upload a photo or video.
helpRegisteringPoint3: Search for reports near a specific address using the advanced search on your dashboard.
helpNotificationsDesc: As a registered user, you can go to the "Settings" page to set up personalized alerts. Define a radius around your location (e.g., 5, 10, or 15 miles) and choose how you want to be notified (In-App, Email, or SMS). When a new report is submitted within your chosen area, you'll receive an alert.
helpGuidelinesDesc: Please be responsible and only post truthful, accurate information. This tool is for community safety. Misuse will result in being banned from the platform. Stay safe.
resetPasswordDesc: Enter your email. If an account exists, we'll send a reset link.
passwordResetSent: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
reportModalLocationDesc: Please confirm the address of the sighting. We'vemade our best guess below.
reportModalLocationDesktopNote: Note: On desktop or without GPS, this location may be inaccurate. Please correct it if necessary.
addressRequired: An address is required to submit a report.
reportDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., 'Three unmarked cars at intersection.' Add any other relevant details here.
mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms & Conditions to register.
termsIntro: Welcome to Watch ICE. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service. This is a community-powered tool for informational purposes only.
termsUserContentBody: You are solely responsible for the content you post, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness. By posting content, you grant us the right to display it but you retain all of your rights to your content. We do not claim ownership of user-submitted reports.
termsDisclaimerBody: This service is provided 'AS IS,' without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of information provided by users. You rely on any information on the service at your own risk.
termsLiabilityBody: In no event shall the creators of Watch ICE be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service. We are a platform for information sharing and are not responsible for the actions of users or any real-world events that may be associated with information on this platform.
termsAcceptanceBody: By creating an account, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by them.
sightingTypeDesc_checkpoint: ICE agents/vehicles are set up at a fixed location (road, street corner, public entrance) stopping people or vehicles for questioning.
sightingTypeUsefulness_checkpoint: Indicates a specific, static high-risk area.
sightingTypeDesc_detainment: An individual is actively being apprehended, questioned, or taken into custody by ICE agents.
sightingTypeUsefulness_detainment: Signals an immediate threat and confirms an active operation.
sightingTypeDesc_sighting_motion: Marked or unmarked ICE vehicles or plainclothes agents are observed moving through an area, seemingly patrolling or driving around.
sightingTypeUsefulness_sighting_motion: Indicates potential upcoming activity or a general presence in a neighborhood.
sightingTypeDesc_sighting_stationary: Marked or unmarked ICE vehicles or agents are observed parked or standing in an area, seemingly staking out a location or waiting.
sightingTypeUsefulness_sighting_stationa: Suggests potential future activity or ongoing surveillance.
sightingTypeDesc_workplace_raid: ICE agents are present at a specific business, factory, construction site, farm, or other workplace, conducting enforcement actions.
sightingTypeUsefulness_workplace_raid: Specific to employment-related operations, important for worker communities.
sightingTypeDesc_residential: ICE agents are observed at or around a private residence, apartment complex, or residential street.
sightingTypeDesc_courthouse: ICE agents are observed at or around courthouses, DMV offices, or other government facilities.
sightingTypeUsefulness_courthouse: Important as these are frequent locations for arrests.
sightingTypeDesc_other: For sightings that don't fit perfectly into the above categories, or a general increase in perceived ICE presence.
sightingTypeUsefulness_other: A necessary catch-all for unique situations. Please describe below.
otherSightingDescriptionPlaceholder: Please provide specific details for this sighting type.
otherSightingDescriptionRequired: A description is required for 'Other' sighting types.
setupNotificationsPrompt: Create your custom notification to be informed by email, SMS or pop up.
setupNotificationsLink: Set up your custom notifications here.
noCountyReportsWelcome: There are no reports in your county yet. Be the first to report a sighting to help keep your community safe, and be sure to share the app with friends!
yourLocationDesc: This determines the default county feed on your dashboard.
shareToNotifyFriends: Share this report to notify friends:
shareMarketingText: Register with vigilaice.com and get notified instantly when ICE is spotted near you.
publicHomeMarketingTitle: Always know when ICE is nearby.
aiAssistantWelcome: Hi, I'm Justo, an expert in all things immigration and ICE, ready to provide you with free support.
aiAssistantError: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
publicHomeMarketingSubtitle: to setup realtime instant TXT and email notification when ice is spotted near you.
iceFacilitiesDesc: This map shows the locations of major ICE processing and detention centers across the country. Click a marker for more information.
donationModalDesc: Your donation helps keep Watch ICE free, active, and constantly improving for everyone in the community.
deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this report? This action cannot be undone.
seed_desc_1: Two unmarked white vans spotted parked near the corner of Maple and 1st Street. Agents were seen inside.
seed_desc_2: ICE checkpoint reported at the on-ramp for I-5. They appear to be stopping all commercial vehicles.
seed_desc_3: Plainclothes agents were seen entering the apartment complex on Chavez Avenue. Be cautious.
seed_desc_4: Marked ICE vehicle seen patrolling slowly through the neighborhood near the community park.
seed_desc_5: Reports of a raid at the poultry processing plant on the south side of town.
seed_desc_6: An individual was witnessed being detained by ICE agents in the parking lot of the Fiesta Market.
seed_desc_7: ICE vehicle parked outside the county courthouse. Agents seen near the entrance.
seed_desc_8: General increase in ICE presence reported around the downtown bus station.
seed_desc_9: A dark SUV with government plates has been circling the blocks around Washington High School.
seed_desc_10: Checkpoint set up at the intersection of Cesar Chavez St and Grand Ave.
seed_desc_11: Two individuals were arrested by ICE agents outside the 7-Eleven on 3rd Street.
seed_desc_12: ICE agents reported going door-to-door at the Oakwood Apartments.
seed_desc_13: Stationary ICE van observed for over an hour near the entrance to the industrial park.
seed_desc_14: Workers reported that ICE agents were present at the construction site on Main Street this morning.

seed_desc_16: Reports of plainclothes agents questioning people near the public library.

newsDescription: Stay informed with the latest curated news and updates regarding immigration and ICE.
legalDescription: Find legal support through our directory or learn about important class action lawsuits against ICE.
lawsuitGoal: What is the goal of the lawsuit?
whatShouldIDo: What should I do if I think I'm eligible?
lawyerDirectoryDescription: Use the filters below to find an immigration lawyer who can help you. This directory is for informational purposes and is not a legal endorsement.
noLawyersFound: No lawyers found matching your criteria.
noLawyersFoundHint: Try adjusting your filters to find more results.
noResultsHint: No lawyers match your current filter selection. Try removing some filters.
